content: this cute mini pumpkin is just for fun you see the mini pumpkins in the shops every fall this way you will always have your own on hand makes a great gift **october 5 2022 plaid wee pumpkin** i added a plaid version which is included in the free pattern it is fussy but a fun knit i recommend going up a needle size for the colorwork you can also wait until the 16 plain row to start the colorwork labelled 1-16 on the chart -- the first few row aren t really visible anyway the chart follows the regular wee pumpkin pattern without the final decrease i have been leaving 16 sts at the end -- it works well for adding the stick which i now hot glue in place **size** one size 3 ½ inches wide by 2 inches high **materials** heavy fingering weight to sport weight yarn ~40 yards samples shown in these yarns cascade 220 superwash sport color 822 pumpkin 136 yds / 50 gms berroco ultra alpaca light color 4201 winter white 144 yds / 50 gms three irish girls glenhaven cashmerino sock color lucky penny 370 yds / 3 5 oz **gauge** gauge is not important yay approx 26 sts and 36 row over 4 inches in stockinette in the round **needles** size 2 75 mm dpns or your preferred method for small gauge knitting **notions** polyfill stuffing small stick or cinnamon stick strong sock yarn string or twine long sharp needle
